-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Quick parsing of fixed-width data formats.
--   
@package fixedwidth-hs
@version 0.4.0.1

module Data.FixedWidth.LargeFile
hGetLines :: Handle -> IO [Text]
getLines :: String -> IO [Text]

module Data.FixedWidth.Parsers
blank :: Int -> Parser ()
data Date
Date :: Int -> Int -> Int -> Date
dYear :: Date -> Int
dMonth :: Date -> Int
dDay :: Date -> Int
fixDate8 :: Parser Date
fixDate8Maybe :: Parser (Maybe Date)
fixInt :: Int -> Parser (Maybe Int)
fixIntLJ :: Int -> Parser (Maybe Int)
fixIntRJ :: Int -> Parser (Maybe Int)
fixText :: Int -> Parser Text
instance ToJSON Date
instance Show Date

module Data.FixedWidth.Examples
data Entry
Entry :: Date -> [Text] -> Int -> Entry
eDate :: Entry -> Date
eNames :: Entry -> [Text]
eValue :: Entry -> Int
parseEntry :: Parser Entry
instance Show Entry
instance ToJSON Entry
